00018 
00019 #ifndef SP_ALLOCATE_H
00020 #define SP_ALLOCATE_H
00021 
00022 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 namespace Spark
00025 {
00026 
00027 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 template <class T>
00029 void Allocate2D (int iCols, int iRows, T**& raatArray)
00030 {
00031     raatArray = new T*[iRows];
00032     raatArray[0] = new T[iRows*iCols];
00033     for (int iRow = 1; iRow < iRows; iRow++)
00034         raatArray[iRow] = &raatArray[0][iCols*iRow];
00035 }
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 template <class T>
00038 void Deallocate2D (T** aatArray)
00039 {
00040     delete[] aatArray[0];
00041     delete[] aatArray;
00042 }
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 template <class T>
00045 void Allocate3D (int iCols, int iRows, int iSlices, T***& raaatArray)
00046 {
00047     raaatArray = new T**[iSlices];
00048     for (int iSlice = 0; iSlice < iSlices; iSlice++)
00049     {
00050         raaatArray[iSlice] = new T*[iRows];
00051         for (int iRow = 0; iRow < iRows; iRow++)
00052             raaatArray[iSlice][iRow] = new T[iCols];
00053     }
00054 }
00055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 template <class T>
00057 void Deallocate3D (int iRows, int iSlices, T*** aaatArray)
00058 {
00059     for (int iSlice = 0; iSlice < iSlices; iSlice++)
00060     {
00061         for (int iRow = 0; iRow < iRows; iRow++)
00062             delete[] aaatArray[iSlice][iRow];
00063         delete[] aaatArray[iSlice];
00064     }
00065     delete[] aaatArray;
00066 }
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069 }   // end namespace: Spark
00070 
00071 #endif
